title: Nieuw Archief voor Wiskunde
summary: The Nieuw Archief voor Wiskunde (English translated title: New Archive for Mathematics) is a quarterly Dutch peer-reviewed scientific journal of mathematics published by the Koninklijk Wiskundig Genootschap (Royal Mathematical Society) since 1875. The new version, the fifth series, started in 2000. The journal covers developments in mathematics in general and in Dutch mathematics in particular.[1][2] It is abstracted and indexed in zbMATH Open.[3]
